thread.title: Meryl Streep to head Berlin film festival jury in February
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep to head Berlin film festival jury in February

title: Meryl Streep to head Berlin film festival jury in February
text: > Entertainment Meryl Streep to head Berlin film festival jury in February FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015 file photo, Meryl Streep poses for photographers upon her arrival at the premiere of the film Suffragette, and is also the opening gala of the London film festival. Meryl Streep has been chosen to head the jury at the Berlin International Film Festival in February. Organizers said Wednesday Oct. 14, 2015, it will be the first time in her career that the Oscar-winning 66-year-old actress has served on a film festival jury. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File)
